resources.string: ERROR: ROOT IS REQUIRED FOR THIS FEATURE!
Due to the nature of this app, root is required in order to change kernel parameters such as your CPU clock speeds. Power Engine will be completely useless if you are not rooted.
Could not backup app engine data!
ERROR: COULD NOT FIND CPU FREQS! PLEASE REPORT THIS AS A BUG!

The service will detect ONLY the package name of the app you are currently running. The information will be used for Power Engine to search if the app\'s package name is a known app by checking it with the app engine. This is to trigger the event \"window state changed\" which will run Power Engine\'s App Engine and find the suitable profile the current app should use.
An error occurred with Power Engine\'s Accessibility Service. Please submit a bug report in Power Engine > More (last tab) > Report a bug.

To prevent Android from killing the service automatically, please disable battery optimisations for Power Engine. If you do not do this, Power Engine can stop running randomly. Battery optimization -> All apps -> Power Engine -> Don\'t optimize
All apps set to Battery profile!
All apps set to Balanced profile!
All apps set to Performance profile!

One or more values could not be found. Please go to \"More (last tab) > Report a bug\" to help me fix the bug! Meanwhile Power Engine will not work and the profile tab will remain at \"Loading…\" to prevent the app from crashing.

Power Engine is a tool to help improve efficiency of your device.

With the use of the Accessibility Service, Power Engine is able to dynamically switch between different profiles on the fly without any user interaction. With App Engine, users can configure what app they want to set for which profile, this will be used for the Accessibility Service to determine what profile to switch to. Users are also able to configure each profile to their liking.

Power Engine supports all ARM SoCs, from Android Nougat and above. It is recommended that you do not use any other tools that may modify any of the components that you see in Power Engine's profile configuration page to prevent any conflicts to this tool.

READ THIS BEFORE REPORTING A BUG: Please reset app data in Preferences to see if this has fixed your problem first before reporting this as a bug!

If you have discovered a bug, please send me the details below:

- Device and SoC (CPU)
- Are you on a custom kernel or custom ROM?
- Android version
- A detailed description of the bug and how to reproduce the bug

Necessary logs are automatically generated for you in "Internal Storage/Android/data/com.zeroinfinity.powerengine/files".
Thank you to all of these people who have further supported me:
Backups are saved as XML files and Restore will only read XML files.
Error: invalid backup file for app engine data!
Error: invalid backup file for profile data!
Error: There is something wrong with the XML structure in the backup file! Please check and fix any errors!
Please restart the app for changes to take effect!
Shows apps installed in the /system partition as well as launchers.
Enables an on-going notification to ensure Power Engine is still working and shows what current app has been detected.
Performance profile will be forced at all times when charging.

Resets Power Engine\'s app data, the app will close after pressing the reset button. If you have found a bug or have a problem, please try this option first before submitting a bug report. Profile data and App Engine data will both be reset.
This cannot be undone and you will lose your profile and app engine data if they are not backed up!
Please refer to the \"About\" section at the bottom of this page.
Every app is using balanced mode, it will not switch!
You need to set up App Engine manually for the first time, you will have to judge which app should use which profile.
Every profile uses the same configs, the CPU frequencies do not change!
You also need to set up your profiles manually for the first time too, by default all profiles are using the default values of your device.
How do I uninstall this app?
If you don\'t want to use this app anymore, simply uninstall the app and reboot your device to restore default values.
Why does this app need root?
You cannot change kernel parameters in the sysfs without root. This includes changing your CPU and GPU frequencies, CPU governors etc. It is impossible to modify these without root.
How do I root my phone?
How can I tell if this app is working?

Install either DevCheck or CPUFloat from the play store to monitor your freqs in real-time as an overlay. Switch between apps and see if the frequencies go up to only what you have set it as in the profiles. For example, you set an app as battery so CPU behaviour from the monitoring apps should only go up to whatever you set the max CPU freq in the battery profile. It should not go above the max CPU freq value you set in that profile.
Power Engine doesn\'t work for some games, profile values aren\'t being applied!

Due to the nature of accessibility services, it can only detect UI views in apps. Games are usually wrapped inside a launchable android application, so all the UI elements of games are inside the game itself, which the accessibility service will not be able to detect.
Displays what profile is currently in use and what app was detected.
